ygData.subject: http header option for arcreader
ygData.msgSnippet: The arcreader tool has the ability to either output a resource with its http header or without it.  There doesn t appear to be an option to just print the http

Subject: http header option for arcreader
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=234926651; y=GCa2OX_xfC1eAiA5NumR9OsJDfWzLSK9HUi5fLC4cZ8CIw
X-Yahoo-Profile: mccownf

The arcreader tool has the ability to either output a resource with its 
http header or without it.  There doesn't appear to be an option to just 
print the http header.  (For me this would be very useful.)

Would it make sense to have a -f=header option so just the http header 
would be displayed?  Or is there another strategy for getting this that 
I'm unaware of?

Thanks,
Frank
